sentences.sContent: Save and export the project by using the project interchange mechanism.
sentences.sContent_eng: Save and export the project by using the project interchange mechanism.
sentences.sCn: 通过使用项目交换机理来保存和导出项目。

sentences.sContent: All of these values should already be set for you when you imported the project interchange file for this article.
sentences.sContent_eng: All of these values should already be set for you when you imported the project interchange file for this article.
sentences.sCn: 在您导入本文中的项目交换文件时，所有这些值都应该已经设置好了。

sentences.sContent: In fact, you can bring the results into SQL queries again if you so wish because DB2 can interchange the languages with DB2.
sentences.sContent_eng: In fact, you can bring the results into SQL queries again if you so wish because DB2 can interchange the languages with DB2.
sentences.sCn: 实际上，如果您愿意，也可以使用 SQL 查询得到同样的结果，因为在 DB2 中这两种语言可以互换。

phrases.pCn: 联运车辆交接站，交汇站；接驳点

words.tran: 可互换的；可交换的；可交替的
相互联系，相互沟通；互相联络

trans.tranOther: to put each of two things in the place of the other, or to be exchanged in this way（
an exchange, especially of ideas or thoughts
